column4: is is possible to move from 7.04 desktop to 7.04 server without a fresh install?
yeah. just alt-ctrl-f2 then sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop then sudo apt-get remove --purge xserver-xorg  i guess. you wont have a gui though afterwards
i thought you were asking about the server install. the server install is basically just a stripped cli only desktop install
yeah but those packages are available anyway for you now
